article.headline: Ark.-Pine Bluff 84, Philander Smith 68
article.story: LITTLE ROCK (AP) -- Terrance Calvin's 17 points led Arkansas-Pine Bluff to a 77-69 win Saturday night over Philander Smith, the second victory by the Golden Lions over the same team in eight days. Calvin was 13-for-13 from the free-throw line to provide most of his points. Foul shots provided the winning margin for UAPB (2-6), as the Lions hit 31-of-36 while Philander Smith only got 20 shots from the line and made just 13. Jason Frierson scored 15 points for UAPB, while William Byrd added 14. UAPB led 31-26 at the half Darren Jamison led Philander Smith (2-5) with 17 points, and grabbed nine rebounds as well. Rashad Aleem scored 13 points, with Brandon Allen adding 12.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
